title: Drawing, "The Immaculate Conception", ca. 1640
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red chalk on paper
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Drawing of the Virgin at center right looking up, surrounded by flying winged putti.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Immaculate Conception", ca. 1640.
ca. 1640. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red chalk on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7056.
